meta.title: VS Code Vert.x Starter Extension
meta.summary: Today, we are really excited to announce the Visual Studio Code Vert.x Starter extension. It allows you to create a Vert.x project, customize the creation, and search for dependencies.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 3.8.0 released!
meta.summary: We are extremely pleased to announce that Eclipse Vert.x 3.8.0 has been released. This is an important release introduceing a few changes ramping up to Vert.x 4.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 3.7.1
meta.summary: We have just released Vert.x 3.7.1, a bug fix release of Vert.x 3.7.x and a few small features.

meta.title: Contract Driven REST Services with Vert.x3
meta.summary: We see a new trend in development where we are shifting from developing applications to APIs. More and more we see services being offered as REST APIs that we are allowed to consume.

meta.title: Presentation of the Vert.x-Swagger project
meta.summary: This post is an introduction to the Vert.x-Swagger project, and describe how to use the Swagger-Codegen plugin and the SwaggerRouter class.

meta.title: Some Rest with Vert.x
meta.summary: This post is part of the Introduction to Vert.x series. Let’s go a bit further this time and develop a CRUD-ish application
